extension.description:
[B]MythBox is a MythTV frontend for XBMC[/B]
- Watch recordings with commercial skipping - Watch live tv - Create and edit recording schedules - Fan art from tvdb, tvrage, tmdb, imdb, and google image search - Enhanged program guide - Show upcoming recordings - Tuner and job status - Supports MythTV 0.21, 0.22, 0.23, and 0.24 (no live tv with 0.24)
MythBox est un frontal MythTV pour XBMC
